listing.listing_description: The sea splashes at the sand outside and marble tile splashes across the floors of this gated Mediterranean estate on Grand Cayman. The half-submerged chaises longues, the stools at the swim-up bar, and the outdoor TV angled toward the pool are perfectly positioned for comfort. Sail away from the dock of the Rum Point Club or stay to sip a mudslide at the bar that invented the cocktail.Your holiday begins with a welcome basket—plus perks like booster seats for the youngest family members—and continues around a pool with a swim-up bar, a wading pool, plenty of loungers, a gas barbecue, and al-fresco dining for twelve. Take the provided tandem kayaks out for a paddle around the bay, and relax by the smart TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi when you need a little shade.The villa makes a grand entrance with a sweeping double staircase leading to an island-side terrace, and the drama continues inside its 10,000 square feet of recently renovated living space. At the center is a double-height living room with an ocean-inspired blue-and-white color scheme, separated from the dining room and fully equipped kitchen by a bank of columns.This vacation rental has six bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms. There are also two bedrooms that share a bathroom with en-suite access from both: one with two queen beds, and one with two double bunk beds. All eight bedrooms have air conditioning and smart TVs, so you have the luxury of following the game without getting out of bed.Put your toes in the sand and relive your honeymoon with a stroll on the aptly named Barefoot Beach, right in front of the villa, or make the 2-minute drive to hammocks strung over white sands at Rum Point. Spend the day snorkeling the shallow bay, then reward yourself with a mudslide from Wreck Bar, which first blended the frozen concoction in the 1970s.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Your ultimate tropical hideaway.Located on the west coast of Thailand, a short distance from Phuket, is the resort island of Koh Yao Noi that hosts the newly completed 4-Bedroom Eagle’s Nest Luxury Villa overlooking the stunning Phang Nga Bay. The seascape of unique limestone islands is incomparable and considered by many to be one of the best views in Asia - in fact for that reason the nearby islands were used as a setting in the 1974 James Bond film, The Man with the Golden Gun.Only 20 minutes from Phuket by speedboat but a million miles from the stresses of modern life, the island paradise of Koh Yao Noi may just be Thailand’s best kept secret. It is located within the magnificent Marine National Park of Phang Nga Bay which possesses over 40 islands and is home to indigenous sea gypsies and protected wildlife. This tropical island is accessible only by boat or helicopter and thus remains largely undeveloped, natural and peaceful. To arrive here is to step back in time.Completed in 2018, on an island with few private villas, the Eagle’s Nest luxury villa is unique for its quality and outlook. The sweeping panoramas from the property are simply breathtaking and can be seen from every room in this expansive estate nestled among the tree-tops. A skilled and personal staffing team ensures that every whim is catered for. The rental offering includes an open-air seated van and driver. This is more than a home away from home, this is a serviced luxury villa on a remote and idyllic tropical island with every detail thought out.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.This Grand Cayman villa looks onto the brilliant blue water of a peaceful Cayman cove. With a brilliant white exterior and welcoming sun terrace, a sense of maritime serenity runs through this modern property. Relax into a poolside sun chair as yachts glide slowly by, making your plans for a sunny beach day, diving trip to a remote and enchanting coral reef, or a visit to charming George Town.The blue and white terrace of this villa mirrors the colors of the Caribbean sky above, resulting in a relaxing mirror image that helps to lull guests into a tranquil state. The upper level of the villa provides a perfect view of the still waters of the cove beyond, while the airy and shaded interior provides a refreshing contrast with the sun-drenched island outside. The light color scheme of the villa’s rooms are broken by arresting splashes of colorful decor, while the welcoming sofas and easy chairs are ideal for guests looking to settle in for a comfortable afternoon. With a fully outfitted kitchen, groups will have all the facilities they need to cater for a delightful stay at this enchanting location.Located on Rum Point, along a quiet stretch of the north coast of Grand Cayman, this villa offers an excellent combination of peace and quiet, plus easy access to the entirety of the island. From the nearby harbour, step on board a chartered yacht for a refreshing cruise along the coast with the Carribbean breeze propelling you on your way. Make an outing to a pleasant beach bar for a refreshing afternoon cocktail, or visit the nearby botanical gardens for a fascinating insight into the island’s local ecology. A visit to one of the island’s many gorgeous beaches is always an option, while the bright lights, renowned grill bars and pleasant restaurants of George Town are just a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Follow the wood-deck down to your own slice of Grace Bay Beach at this Bohemian-beach house in Turks and Caicos. Celebrate your honeymoon in a minimalistic setting, only decorated with high-end furnishings and original works of art. Spend your afternoons lounging by the pool or splashing around in the sea. Later, walk over to Turtle Cove Marina and have dinner at one of their seafront restaurants.Authentic beach houses are increasingly becoming a thing of the past, being replaced by larger, character-less villas and condos. Beach Shack stays true to the original style, embracing the natural elements that you traveled for, not the gadgets you can find anywhere. That said, Beach Shack’s simple ingredients are of the highest quality. The walls are Balinese pearl stone. The ceiling is an exotic teak. And the floors are white coral. Outside, the ocean-front pergola is the perfect place to sip wine with that special someone. Then, sit for a moonlit dinner at the alfresco set on the terrace.After spending a few days soaking up the solitude of Beach Shack’s private stretch of sand, visit the west-side of Grace Bay Beach for a tour of the area on horseback. While you’re there, consider a snorkeling or scuba diving lesson. The Crystal clear waters of the Caribbean are perfect for first-timers. Boat tours and fishing charters are also available at the marina, as well as private yacht rentals.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Immerse yourself in the charms of St. Martin at Magnolia. A sophisticated hideaway overlooking the Caribbean Sea, this luxury vacation rental perfectly captures the island’s mix of chic atmosphere and incredible natural scenery. Reserve all three bedrooms for a getaway with up to six friends and family members, or book a stay in one or two bedrooms for a quieter holiday or even a honeymoon.Take in the stunning views over the ocean to the neighboring island of Saba from the villa’s expansive private terrace. There are loungers in the shade and sunshine, a pool with a built-in bar area, covered sitting and dining areas, a barbecue and even an al-fresco mini-bar with a fridge. When the sun sets, flip on the provided mosquito trap and linger outdoors, or head inside to watch satellite TV or share photos via Wi-Fi.Linked to the terrace by wide sliding doors and topped by vaulted ceilings, the interiors of Magnolia are bright and modern. In the living and dining rooms, sleek furnishings create a contemporary vibe that’s given a beachy touch by wicker chairs and light fixtures. The fully equipped kitchen opens directly to the al-fresco dining area for a seamless indoor-outdoor experience.Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has a king bed and an en-suite bathroom with both indoor and outdoor showers. Two of the bedrooms are connected—the perfect setup for parents traveling with children but wanting their own space. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are stylish oases with their own vaulted ceilings, brightly hued accent walls and doors to the terrace.Magnolia’s location in the island’s Terres Basses - Hillside area is private, quiet and beautiful—think lush green hillsides sloping gently to an azure sea. But it’s also close to the white sands of Long Bay Beach, popular with celebrities, and Marigot, capital of the French side of the island. You’ll find plenty of restaurants within a 10-minute drive, but for a unique experience, make the 20-minute trip to Grand Case, known as the culinary capital of the Caribbean.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tranquil waters lap in the foreground and snow-capped peaks rise in the background at Kohanga Lakeside Villa. This spectacular South Island vacation rental is on the shores of Lake Wakatipu, close to skiing, golf and the attractions of central Queenstown. Its spacious interiors and four bedrooms mean you can invite up to eight friends or family members to enjoy the sublime setting.Start the morning with a coffee on the lakefront balcony, which has a sitting area and a glass railing for uninterrupted views; later on, follow the steps down to the lake or relax on a lower-level terrace with a barbecue and hot tub. In the evenings, unwind inside with the help of the satellite television, sound system, Wi-Fi and wine fridge.An open-plan layout, wall-to-wall windows and pale wood floors lend a bright, airy feel to the spacious great room of this luxury villa. The chic, mid-century-influenced sitting and dining areas are next to the glass; open the sliding doors to the terrace for a breeze off the lake. The fully equipped kitchen has its own stunning views as well as a breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances.The master suite at Kohanga Lakeside Villa has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and its own private balcony. There’s a second bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, as well as two bedrooms with king beds that share a bathroom. The latter two beds can be converted to two twin beds for more flexible accommodations during your holiday.The beauty of the villa’s setting is rivaled only by its convenience. In snowy weather, make the short drive to The Remarkables and Coronet Peak ski areas; in warmer temperatures, it’s an easy ride to the Queenstown golf course. Spend a day exploring the shops and restaurants in central Queenstown, or an evening at its casino or on a honeymoon-style cruise around the lake.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The ocean peeks through curtains of palm fronds outside the louvered windows of this minimalist home on Barbados’ west coast. Inspired by the simple layout of the island’s traditional chattel houses, this contemporary villa uses wood-paneled ceilings to shade and slatted walls to invite cooling breezes. Follow the path to golden Gibbes Beach for a swim in the shallows or nap in the shade. Watch the waves from a lounger on the oceanfront deck, toss local seafood on the barbecue for a quick lunch or dinner, and soak in the al-fresco hot tub as the sun sets over the water. An Apple TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi, and wine fridge make light work of finding evening entertainment. Your holiday at this vacation rental also includes the services of a cook and housekeeper.A koi pond greets you at the entrance to this luxury property, creating a tranquil feel and hinting at the ocean views to come. That calm pervades the open-concept living areas, from a sitting area with sofas clustered around a Noguchi coffee table to a dining table for eight. The neutral palette and sleek surfaces continue in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the three bedrooms at Shoestring has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; one of them also has a honeymoon-suite-worthy private balcony with a hot tub. Together, the bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to six friends or family members.St. Peter is known for having some of the best beaches on Barbados, and Gibbes Beach—just in front of the villa—is no exception. It’s a quiet stretch of golden sand, ringed by tall trees for shade and opening to relatively calm, shallow waters. Depending on the tide, you can also wade north to Mullins Beach for an ice cream from the stand or a cocktail from the beach bar.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to a breezy, balmy island paradise at Villa Rosa. From its secluded hillside location, this luxury Jamaica vacation rental commands views of the lush tropical forest all the way to the sea near Half Moon Beach. Its chic, relaxed interiors and four bedrooms are fully staffed by a chef, butler and housekeeper who are ready to make your holiday a memorable one.The villa’s wooden gates swing open to reveal a palm-lined allée leading toward the house, terrace and the ocean beyond. Comfortable sitting areas and an al-fresco dining area and barbecue beckon on the terrace just outside the house, and steps lead down to a sunny deck with lounge chairs around the heated pool. Active guests will appreciate the private exercise room with a deck for yoga; those who just want to relax will appreciate the outdoor hot tub and indoor spa and bar. In addition to the chef, butler and housekeeping services, your stay at Villa Rosa also includes membership at the elegant, exclusive Half Moon Club.The classic Caribbean aesthetic of high-contrast white and dark wood gets a modern update at Villa Rosa, where whitewashed ceilings with exposed wooden beams are the backdrop to sleek, airy spaces that open to the outdoor living areas. Enjoy the ocean breeze from one of the sitting areas closest to the terrace, or get cozier in the chevron-patterned armchairs around the television. A formal dining area can seat up to eleven, and there’s space for more casual meals at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Rosa has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; two have al-fresco showers and terraces, and two have al-fresco bathtubs and balconies. If you’re traveling as a family, especially with older children, you can convert the sofa in the media room to three twin beds. Vaulted ceilings and ample windows give the bedrooms the same bright, sunny feel as the rest of the house, and spa-like bathrooms invite you to linger.A stay at this villa puts you just a few minutes from the amenities of the Half Moon Club, from the golf course to the clear, calm waters of Half Moon Beach. If you’d like to see more of the island, join the couples on honeymoon for a romantic dinner in Montego Bay, meet local fauna at Rockland’s Bird Sanctuary, follow the flow at Mayfield Falls or sample the goods on offer at Appleton Sugar and Rum Factory.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience a Carribean dream in one of the three delightful, linked homes of this verdant hillside property. Overlooking sapphire-blue Smuggler’s Cove, guests will love the coral-tiled terrace, ideal for pool parties, barbecues and wet-bar fun. Offering premium comfort and sea-view serenity, it’s an ideal home base after a day of swimming, diving or enjoying the beach bars of Tortola’s West End.Cohoba House is a great choice for groups that are looking for privacy for individual families, couples or groups, while sharing a great communal space. Throw open the shutters of the three villas to take in the breathtaking scenery, as the blue seascape below collides with brilliant golden sands. With the property featuring sheltered but airy alfresco dining areas, private balconies, welcoming wood-lined bedrooms and deck doors that just ask to be thrown open, guests can relax and embrace the sea breeze and Carribean sunshine in the best of surroundings. Acting as a secluded enclave on the hillside, guests can be assured of privacy and a peaceful atmosphere.Being located at the western tip of Tortola, guests can choose from a wealth of day-trip and nighttime options. The proximity of Smuggler’s Cove ensures that guests of all ages can experience one of the British Virgin Island’s finest beaches, sheltered on three sides by green hillsides and overlaid by swaying palm trees. Other options include taking a refreshing day cruise by yacht into the great blue yonder, a heart-racing power boat outing, or engaging in a fascinating day dive into the blue world offshore, where schools of tropical fish, coral reefs and rays await. After unwinding with a tropical drink in one of the relaxed local bars, return to the villa’s private balcony or expansive terrace for rest, relaxation and conversation as the sun dips into the sea to the west.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Feel the fresh tropical breeze everywhere you go at this open-air Balinese villa in Kuta. While the private chef prepares breakfast, catch up on some reading and sip herbal tea beneath a beach umbrella. At night, gather the group around the fire pit or lay back in a sunbed to watch the stars. Next morning, start the day with a stroll along Petitenget Beach or sign-up for a surfing lesson.At Eshara’s center, the refreshing swimming pool is outlined with lush gardens and palm trees. Moving to the terrace, you’ll appreciate several smaller lounge areas that are perfect when you need to escape the group for more intimate moments. The open concept living room is decorated in vibrant textiles and contemporary furniture set beneath an extra-high exposed-beam roof. If every bit of lingering stress hasn’t melted away, treat yourself to a long soak in the master ensuite’s spa-like tub.Grab your camera and your hiking boots for a day on the trails of Mount Batukaru. Follow winding paths through lush jungle and stop at the scenic lookouts for a picnic. After, head to Tanah Lot for sunset. The ancient Balinese temple in the sea looks extra-incredible as the sun sinks into the horizon. For dinner, you’ll find plenty of options in Seminyak. Later, dance the night away on the beach at Finn’s Recreation Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With its stunning Pacific views and sought-after location, Hale Makena Maui is one of the most impressive 4-bedroom Maui villas available. This resplendent villa is found beachside in Makena, just south of the ultra-luxurious enclave of Wailea; escape the crowds in favor of a more tranquil, yet equally upscale Maui experience. The villa recently underwent a complete redesign at the hands of James McIntyre Design, a firm specializing in style-forward decor. Hale Makena Maui is a fully legal and permitted Maui vacation rental, Permit Number: STKM 2013/0011.With over 4,800 sq ft of indoor and outdoor living space, you’re sure to find your favorite spot to enjoy the Hawaiian sun. Sit back on your terrace and gaze out to the ocean, or walk around your infinity pool, savoring the scent of lush, tropical gardens. Make the most of outdoor living with the alfresco poolside dining area, private cabana bar and gas barbecue. Sink into the jacuzzi with a freshly mixed Mai Tai and watch a glorious sunset light up the horizon.The modern, air-conditioned interior is designed for maximum comfort, and an immense, retractable wall joins the great room to your outdoor living spaces. From the large, elegant living and dining area that shares in the ocean views, to the fabulous gourmet kitchen, this is a stylish, contemporary and beautifully presented home from all rooms. The decorative touches are distinctly contemporary, yet their shapes, materials and colors pay homage to traditional Hawaiian aesthetics. Turquoise hues radiate from artwork and upholstery, while sofas, walls and ceilings reflect sandy beach tones.Three ocean view suites have luxurious en-suite bathrooms and magnificent ocean views, with the two upstairs rooms benefiting from private lanais. These three suites are fitted with King-size beds and the fourth bedroom presents a very stylish Queen bed. The Master suite enjoys its own sitting area, and boasts an immense walk-in closet with custom wood cabinets. All bedrooms have air-conditioning, a flat-screen television and Blu-ray DVD players.There’s a huge amount to see and do in the vicinity. Golf and shopping are a 5-minute drive away, and an exciting array of watersports, including scuba diving, snorkeling and kayaking can be found just a two-minute walk from the property. This part of South Maui is rich in wildlife, with turtles, eagle rays and dolphins frequently spotted. This luxury home looks directly down on a pristine coral reef that can be seen from the master bedroom balcony.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Hawaii Permit #: STKM20130011

listing.listing_description: Easily one of Deer Valley’s most luxurious vacation homes, Sky Ridge Retreat offer an endless supply of amenities, a gorgeous atmosphere, and ample space for your large group. With six amazing bedrooms, Sky Ridge has accommodations for twenty-one, making it perfect for a larger scale family event or corporate retreat. At Sky Ridge, Deer Valley ski access is just steps from the front door and the mountain views are endless.From the massive stone fireplace of the great room, to the checkered floor of the movie theatre’s concession, Sky Ridge is gorgeous and dynamic. Stone, wood, and plenty of mountain framing windows set a luxurious alpine tone throughout the estate. Plush designer furniture and spacious rooms, lit by bright chandeliers, create a warm and inviting atmosphere. In a vacation home with accommodations for twenty-one, space is important. Sky Ridge does a great job of making sure each common space has enough room for the whole group, as does the kitchen, which is essentially two high-end kitchens in one.On the multi-level terrace, views of Jordanelle Lake and the ski slopes can be seen from outdoor living spaces as well as the twenty-person hot tub. After you’ve warmed up in the hot tub, head back inside and settle in for a movie night in the home theatre, complete with a fifties style concession area. Or, if you’ve still got some energy after a long day on the slopes, challenge a friend to a game of billiards, ping pong, or foosball.Sky Ridge’s first six bedrooms feature either a king or queen sized bed and en-suite bathrooms. The final bedroom has three sets of bunk beds and an en-suite, making it great for kids and extra guests.Aside from the world-class skiing of Deer Valley, Park City is home to plenty of great parks, golf courses, shops, and restaurants. Check the local concert listings as well because this quaint ski town also boasts a pretty vibrant nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Dramatic mountain views take center stage at Governors Penthouse 401. From your perch in the heart of downtown Steamboat Springs, take in beautiful vistas of the Yampa River, Howelsen Hill and Emerald Mountain. Spend your holiday skiing, golfing, rafting or soaking in the town’s namesake hot springs. At the end of a day of the outdoor adventures in Colorado, bliss out with this vacation rental’s luxury amenities and and three bedrooms.Leave your car in the underground parking space and let the elevator whisk you up to the penthouse, where a sprawling private deck awaits. On warmer nights, prepare dinner on the barbecue, sit down at the al-fresco dining area and end the evening with a marshmallow roast over the firepit; when it’s colder outside, enjoy a soak under the stars in the hot tub.An expansive open-plan great room bordered by floor-to-ceiling windows lets you bring the whole family together—and appreciate the mountain views. Stretch out on the sectional in front of the fireplace and flat-screen television, set up a board game on the round table by the window, or toast to a special occasion around the dining table, which has seating for eight. A breakfast bar and gourmet appliances in the fully equipped kitchen make it easy to satisfy après-ski appetites.The warm contemporary feel of Governors Penthouse 401 continues in the three bedrooms, from a master suite with a king bed and en-suite bathroom to two bedrooms with a queen bed and bunk beds, respectively, that share a bathroom. In the bathroom, touches like glass-enclosed showers and stand-alone bathtubs with views of their own invite you to linger.The penthouse is part of the Olympian complex in downtown Steamboat Springs, just a 5-minute drive or seasonal shuttle ride from shopping and dining and 10 minutes from Steamboat Ski Resort. Avid skiers can test their skills on runs that have hosted World Cup competitions, while summer visitors can choose from a wealth of activities ranging from golf and kayaking to rafting on the Yampa River. Not to be missed are the town’s hot springs, whether you take the kids to splash in the pools at Old Town or your sweetheart for a honeymoon-worthy soak at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Shotover Point is an enchanting luxury home outside Queenstown on the South Island of New Zealand, an easy drive from Coronet Peak and The Remarkables ski areas. Nestled amid vineyards along the Shotover River, the converted antique farmhouse balances rustic alpine charm with superb modern comforts and amenities, including an outdoor hot tub, a gourmet kitchen, and excellent media features. Ample interior and outdoor living areas form a comfortable haven in any season—a perfect home-base for outdoor sport enthusiasts or destination wedding guests. Three spacious bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families and groups of friends up to six in size.The open-concept great room forms the heart of the home, with high ceilings, exposed timber beams, and a large open fireplace. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and generous prep space, and serves a lovely dining table for eight. Comfortable lounge sofas face the fireplace and TV, ideal for toasty evenings or quiet afternoons. The historic home has maintained much of its vintage artistry, with superb stonework, rough-hewn wood, and wrought-iron accents. Thick walls, abundant natural light, underfloor heating, and a strategic orientation create a comfortable interior ambiance.Glass doors open wide to the spacious deck, inviting beautiful views and fresh air into the home. The terrace invites you to relax and celebrate in the open air—relishing alfresco meals, sipping locally produced wine by the fire, or crawling into the hot tub for a soothing soak under the sublime sky.The villa's master suite features a king bed, walk-in closet, desk, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. Each of the guestrooms has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom, and one includes a pullout sofa for an additional guest. One of the guestrooms has a private lounge, and another opens to a private terrace.Beyond the exquisite seclusion of Shotover Point, you're about twenty kilometers from the region's two major ski resorts; fourteen kilometers from Queenstown Golf Course; and ten kilometers form the shops and nightlife in the town center. Queenstown Airport is just seven minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sculpture and stone gild the open spaces of this penthouse perched above Melbourne’s Parkville area. Laid out over the top 2 floors of the Arcadia building, this apartment boasts views indoors and out, thanks to floor-to-ceiling windows and colorful artwork, and at night, its expanses of marble change under mood lighting. It’s less than 10 minutes to Queen Victoria market and museums. Your holiday at the penthouse begins with an airport transfer and includes concierge service throughout. Once settled in, take in city skyline panoramas from a private balcony with a gas barbecue and alfresco dining for 8. Pour a glass of an Australian vintage from the wine fridge to sip while watching the smart TV or browsing over Wi-Fi, or host a family movie night in a media room with a projector and screen. Designed by local firm Fender Katsalidis Architects, the curving building has a contemporary look, and this luxury apartment plays into that with an open-concept great room clad in polished finishes. A wood panel separates the living area from a dining table for 8, and a breakfast bar sits at the entrance to a fully equipped, marble-splashed kitchen. There are 3 bedrooms with king beds at this vacation rental: 2 with ensuite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with honeymoon-suite-worthy details like wall-to-wall city views and a jetted tub, and 1 with access to a hall bathroom. There’s also 1 bedroom with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. Grab a coffee from one of the city’s famously great spots and set off for the 1-minute walk to the Royal Park Golf Course or the 8-minute trip on foot to the park-like Melbourne Zoo. By car, it’s less than 10 minutes to must-sees like the Melbourne Museum and Carlton Gardens, Queen Victoria Market, and the Immigration Museum. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that the upstairs terrace will only be available Fall 2018. Please inquire with a Villa Specialist for more details.The moment you arrive in the villa’s stunning courtyard; you are in paradise. It’s a perfect stage for this stylish contemporary home with mesmerizing views. Lush gardens are filled with the fragrance of jasmine, colorful allemande and vivid bougainvillea anchored with magnificent palms. The covered walkway, as beautiful in daylight as in night time, is flanked on either side with small pools planted with tropical water foliage. Enter the double door and the panoramic view spreads before you like a dramatic mural. From the main terrace, the sweeping vistas stretch from La Samanna on Long Bay Beach westward to Plum Bay Beach; from the roof top lounge it is 360. The photogenic sunsets are simply spectacular.The layout takes full advantage of the villa’s visual assets. Deep covered loggias, supported by soft grey concrete columns, and sunning terraces flow around the house. Dining and lounging areas are strategically positioned to observe the view. The stunning infinity pool coils like a nautilus shell into an infinity jet tub.The interiors seamlessly connect with the exterior spaces. Floor to ceiling glass pocket doors open completely to the outside. The spacious open plan living and dining room, with unusual high vaulted ceilings, belongs in a design magazine. Sleek, elegant furnishings in grey, taupe, and cream are accented with pops of color. Vibrant modern art appears in every room adding visual interest. A modern gourmet kitchen opens to the view, connecting the chef with the guests.The three bedrooms are equal in size, spacious, and comfortable. Each room has private indoor and outdoor seating. The décor is clean and modern, schemed in taupe, grey and white each room with an individual color scheme. The spa bathrooms are stunning in tumbled travertine, Indonesian river rocks and sleek fixtures. Walk in showers flow into outdoor showers with sea views.Although very secluded, you are very close to amenities. Long Bay and Plum Bay beach are nearby. 10 minute drive brings you to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case; 30 to Philipsburg’s shopping haven and a mere 10 to the airport.

listing.listing_description: Book the ultimate ski-in, ski-out holiday at Beaver Mountain 411. This luxury Steamboat Springs vacation rental is part of One Steamboat Place, an exclusive community at the base of the gondola. Enjoy easy access to the slopes during the day, and gorgeous open-plan living spaces in the evenings.Guests of Beaver Mountain 411 are welcome to use the community’s shared outdoor pool and hot tub, fitness center, games room and other beautifully appointed spaces. For private entertaining, the villa has its own furnished deck with a barbecue, as well as a fireplace, flat-screen television, wine cooler and Wi-Fi.After a day on the slopes, the villa’s open-plan great room is a warm, welcome respite. Cozy up to the fireplace and television on the roomy sectional or leather armchairs, prepare a well-deserved feast using the professional-grade appliances in the fully equipped kitchen, and settle in to enjoy around a dining table that seats ten. As the sun sets, you can watch the lights go on in the Yampa Valley below through the glass doors to the deck.Four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight friends or family on a Colorado adventure. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with its own fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom. The fourth bedroom has two double beds and a shared hall bath, and is perfect for older kids who want their own space.Each morning, put on your ski boots in the villa and make the 1-minute walk to the gondola at Steamboat Ski Resort. In the winter, One Steamboat Place provides complimentary shuttle service; in the summer, you’ll hardly need the shuttle to make the short drive to local attractions like the Rollingstone Ranch Golf Club. If you need a break from skiing, hiking, biking or other outdoor activities, treat yourself to a family-friendly day out at Steamboat Springs Old Town or a honeymoon-worthy soak in the mineral waters of Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Just up the coast from Cabo San Lucas, Villa Jacqueline sits on the ocean facing hillside of San Jose Del Cabo. Jacqueline’s property is part of a small sea side community, interwoven with holes from the Puerto Los Cabos Golf Course, overlooking the Sea of Cortez. With accommodations for ten and a floor plan perfect for hosting, Villa Jacqueline is ideal for a family vacation, golf trip with friends, or a small corporate retreat.Jacqueline’s interior is extremely spacious. The living room faces a wall length opening to the covered terrace, which is home to a wet bar, alfresco dining, and plenty of outdoor furniture, making it more like a second living room. The decor is simple in a sophisticated way. It’s neutral and relaxing, while conveying a semi-formal elegance. And, with such wide openings to the terrace, the ocean view, ocean breeze, and natural sunlight fill Jacqueline’s interior with ease. Moving into the kitchen, you’ll instantly fall in love with the shear amount of workspace. Granite countertops, a breakfast bar, and an island provide all the space you’ll need, and more. High-end stainless steel appliances and stained wood cabinetry complete the rest of the kitchen’s highly functional environment.Outside, not one, but two, swimming pools await you. The larger infinity pool is perfect for family and group fun, while the lap pool keeps the focus on the workout. And, after the workout, or just because, there’s a relaxing hot tub as well. There’s also an outdoor fire pit and barbecue on the terrace, perfect for grilling up something fresh from a local market.For beach access, take a short walk towards the coast and enjoy Fundadores Private Beach Club. Follow Fundadores’ white sand up to their beachfront bar and restaurant for some deliciously fresh sea food, or a casual drink while you enjoy the ocean view.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just a few kilometers outside of the bustling city of Marrakesh, this peaceful vacation villa exists in unparalleled privacy, especially considering its convenient location. With six en-suite bedrooms and an abundance of indoor/outdoor living space, Dar Moucha is the perfect home base for exploring Morocco with friends, a large family get-together, or a unique destination wedding.Dar Moucha is a house built as if it grew from the ground. A space that exists harmoniously with its natural surroundings. Orange trees, an orchard, a small farm, and an organic vegetable patch provide fresh produce from guests of the villa. An open-air design ensures fresh breeze and natural sunlight fill the interior spaces. In the living room, you’ll find modern designer furniture, calming decor, and high-end electronics. The bedrooms feature more of the same, each coming with a king-sized bed and en-suite bathroom.Lush gardens and beautiful palm trees line the outside of Dar Moucha’s incredible pool, providing shade and privacy to the exciting island lounge area within the pool. A great feature of this villa is the ability to accommodate the entire group in all of its unique settings. From the pool island to the grand foyer, spacious living room, and formal dining area, there’s space for everyone. There’s also a few more secluded spots, like the hammam and the fire pit, great for some alone time with someone special. The villa also comes equipped with Wi-Fi, air conditioning, an exercise room, satellite television, and breakfast.There are lots of exciting ways to discover Marrakesh’s beautiful environment. Horseback tours, camel tours, mountain treks, and hot air balloon rides are all available at Marrakesh Resort. Skiing is available on Atlas Mountain, which is just a few kilometers past the Marrakesh Palmeraie. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, Ryads Al Maaden Medina and Amelkis golf courses are about twelve kilometers from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: In the 1950s, Jamaican attorney Clinton Hart happened onto this remarkable three-acre oceanfront location and built a simple beach cottage for his family. Since then, Canoe Cove has been a virtually unembellished and beloved family home for generations. Recently, Hart’s grandson replaced the worn cottage with new architecture and contemporary finishing. Straightforward, uncomplicated and loaded with thoughtful comforts, this Ocho Rios bijou redefines luxury in a beachy, barefoot lifestyle!You will hardly know where to begin your holiday. A splash in the Junior Olympic swimming pool or a soothing soak in the hot tub? Keep the good times rolling with some alfresco dining while the private chef makes the barbeque sizzle. Meanwhile, the consummate entertainers will surely find themselves mixing drinks at the outdoor wet bar. From an alfresco shower, to sun loungers, an oversized sandbox and a putting green, Canoe Cove has got you covered. Take the paddle boards and kayaks out to sea, have a rally at the tennis court or shoot some hoops – the options are virtually endless!This vacation rental is stylish without pretense or overstatement. Textures of exotic woods establish a grounded, organic ambience as a backdrop against stylish furnishings. Cedar, Jojoba, Honduran pine, marble, coral stone and natural cement floors are so cool under bare feet. Finishes of reclaimed teak and driftwood echo the landscape of the Caribbean. Decorating a hallway is a whimsical six foot pendant lamp made entirely of old magazines. Across the lawn, the supporting structures of the gazebo are purloined telephone poles with bamboo bases. Delicate orchids adorn most rooms and are cultivated on-site.Seven exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the suites offer king size beds, except for one with two doubles. Perks include rain showers and access to a terrace or balcony. Canoe Cove makes a great bet for a large family holiday or a special event such as a wedding.During your stay in this enchanting part of Jamaica, the nearby outdoor museum Columbus Park offers the opportunity to learn about the Spanish Colonial era through the artifacts on display. Perhaps you will take a boat trip or visit the friendly inhabitants of Dolphin Cove. However you choose to spend your time, you will cherish the familiar feelings of coming back to Canoe Cove!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: World-class skiing awaits at this mountainside lodge hidden away in the Bachelor’s Gulch neighborhood, 6 minutes from Avon. Late nights with family and friends are all but guaranteed beneath the soaring-ceilings of this inviting, social setting. In the morning, hit the slopes with a 5-minute walk to Roughlock Ski Run at Beaver Creek. Vail, Copper Mountian, and Lionshead are nearby as well. On your way home, stop in at the Ritz Carlton’s pool and hot tub, where you’ll have shared access. Then, warm yourself by the imposing, natural stone fireplace after a day on the mountain. Before dinner, gather around the marble bar in the farm-style kitchen and recount tales from the ski slopes. Later, stretch out on the stately leather sofa and bask in the villa’s traditional alpine style. In the warmer months, move the party to the outdoor lounge and fire up the barbecue for lunch. In the summertime, Colorado’s rolling fairways, dynamic shifts in elevation, and tricky hole placement offer a challenge to golfers of every skill level. After a round, head to Avon or Beaver Creek for lunch at a craft brew-pub. Take the kids skating at the Beaver Creek Ice Rink. Then, drive 13-km to check out the newest ski gear, sit down for dinner, or dance the night away in Vail Village. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From views over the perfectly palm-fringed Nai Thon Beach to spectacular sunsets over the Andaman Sea, Malaiwana Penthouse will leave you breathless. Perched on a hillside on the northwest coast of Phuket, this serene four-bedroom vacation rental makes an ideal escape for up to eight friends and family members. And though the surroundings make it feel like your own private tropical idyll, this luxury property is close to golf, spas, beach clubs and even the airport.The penthouse’s glass doors slide open to an incredible terrace with loungers, a barbecue, a pergola-covered sitting area, an al-fresco dining area and a heated infinity pool that seems to spill into the sea. After a day on the terrace or the beach, treat yourself to a glass from the wine fridge and a favorite show or movie in the villa’s media room, or post photos from your holiday via Wi-Fi.Thanks to the wall of sliding glass doors, it’s easy to open the penthouse’s open-concept living areas to the terrace, creating one seamless indoor-outdoor space. The sleek great room is stylish yet understated, with mod pieces that make a chic statement without trying to outdo the views. Catch up on reading on the tuxedo-style sofas, relive the day’s adventures around the pedestal dining table or sip an espresso from the machine at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the four bedrooms at Malaiwana Penthouse has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and direct terrace access; two of the four have their own lounge areas as well. Spectacular views, crisp white bedding and spa-worthy bathrooms splashed in marble make the bedrooms into luxe retreats to rival any honeymoon suite.While it’s tempting to simply spend a stay relaxing by the pool, it’s well worth the short walk or buggy ride down the hill from the villa to Nai Thon Beach, where you can sunbathe on the soft sand, swim or snorkel in the clear, warm water, or sample fresh seafood from local vendors. Book a tee time at the nearby golf course or a treatment at one of several spas close by, or set off on a fishing or sailing excursion from the Royal Phuket Marina.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Early birds and night owls alike will find their bliss at Windchat Villas. Made up of two villas, Sunrise and Sunset, this luxury oceanfront Bahamas vacation rental has exceptional views of the island and ocean, as well as 250 feet of gorgeous pink-sand beach. As another beautiful Caribbean day dawns over the eastern point of the island of Eleuthera, welcome the sun from one of the four bedrooms—two in each villa—and gather with friends and family during the day in the resort-worthy outdoor living areas.There’s plenty at Windchat Villas for guests of all ages (and activity levels). Down at the beach, have a swim in the warm water, take the kayaks or stand-up paddleboards out to explore or bring back honeymoon memories with a sunset stroll along the sand. Spot cruise ships from the porches, flip on the sound system as you stretch out in a lounger by the heated infinity pool or challenge everyone to shuffleboard, foosball, ping-pong or even tennis or basketball on the private court. When the sun begins to sink, rinse off in one of the outdoor showers and heat up the barbecue for dinner.Built in 1964 by a Pan American Airways executive and recently renovated, Sunrise was the original villa on the site; its counterpart, Sunset, was just finished. But although they differ in age, the two houses share open layouts, a breezy aesthetic and stunning views. Neutral walls, high ceilings and sand-colored tile floors form the base for furnishings in tropical hues of watery turquoise and palm-leaf green. Both villas have formal dining areas with ocean views and bright, fully equipped kitchens.Each of the two Windchat Villas has a master suite and one additional bedroom. In Sunrise, the master suite has a king bed, private hall bathroom and ocean views, and the second bedroom has two twin beds and an ensuite bathroom. There is also a sleeping loft available to accomodate two additional guests. In Sunset, all three bedrooms have an ensuite bathroom, and two bedrooms feature a balcony as well as ocean views. From the villas’ location on North Palmetto Point, you’ll have easy access to the island’s other standout beaches, attractions and airports. Book your ticket into Governor’s Harbor Airport, Rock Sound International Airport or North Eleuthera Airport. Once at Windchat Villas, you’re just a 13 km drive from French Leave Beach and within day-trip distance of Surfer’s Beach and Lighthouse Beach. Ask the villa manager if you need help organizing a snorkeling or fishing expedition, a horseback ride on the beach, or take a day trip to swim with the pigs on Exuma. Meet local fauna at Edwin’s Turtle Lake Marine Preserve, locals themselves at Governor’s Harbour, or marvel at the natural scenery of Ocean Hole, the Hatchet Bay Caves, the Glass Window Bridge and Preacher’s Cave. If you have time to see more of the Bahamas on your holiday, neighboring Harbour Island is 70 km away, and tiny Spanish Wells is 85 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step into a California dream at In the Hills. Set in the heart of Beverly Hills, only a few miles from iconic attractions like Rodeo Drive, Universal Studios and the Hollywood Bowl, this luxury vacation rental puts all of greater Los Angeles within your reach. Of course, open-plan contemporary architecture and resort-worthy outdoor living areas make it tempting to stay in and entertain family or friends.In the Hills opens to a private terrace with a pool, hot tub, sitting and dining areas, and a firepit, all tucked behind mature landscaping. Spend the day enjoying the sun from a lounger by the pool, and the evening listening to a favorite album on the villa’s sound system, watching the Apple TV or sipping a glass of California wine by the indoor gas fireplace.An open floor plan is perfect for entertaining or simply enjoying the sunshine that floods the interiors. Bays of windows and sleek tile floors in the living and dining room are an understated backdrop for daring modern furnishings such as black leather armchairs, white tuxedo sofas and elegant metal-legged dining chairs around a weighty table. The fully equipped kitchen has its own sitting area, breakfast bar and stylish accents from stainless steel appliances to beautifully patterned stone countertops.The villa’s four bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, are ideal for groups of friends or couples on holiday together. Relive your honeymoon in the master suite, which has a king bed, dual en-suite bathrooms with a jetted tub, a lounge area with a fireplace, and its own balcony, or enjoy a living area and balcony access from a second bedroom with a king bed. The other two bedrooms have queen beds.From In the Hills, it’s less than 10 miles to shopping on Rodeo Drive and The Grove, the thrills of Universal Studios, concerts at the Hollywood Bowl and the incredible collection and architecture at the Getty Center. Within 15 miles, you’ll find golf, great hiking trails in Topanga State Park and a choice of beaches where you can surf or stroll the pier.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Registration number: HSR19-002199

Their expansive outside area comes complete with a private 20m infinity pool, swim-up bar, open-air dining, and relaxing day beds. All feature state-of-the-art amenities, modern kitchens, and a full team of dedicated staff to ensure the best in personal service.With your own private chef on hand day and night, you can enjoy custom-designed menus meticulously prepared with fresh local produce and the halthiest of ingredients. Fine wines compliment the authentic Royal Thai cuisine and Western gastronomy. Magnificent views from the outdoor dining space or the open plan glass-walled living space complete this unparalleled dining experience.

listing.listing_description: Reserve a stay in a brand-new luxury villa at one of Colorado's best-known ski areas at The Lion Vail - 3 Bedroom Residence. This thoughtfully designed, freshly built vacation rental is part of an exclusive community just minutes from Lionshead Village, two ski lifts and Vail Ski Resort. Its three bedrooms offer plenty of space for a group of up to six friends or a family.Guests of The Lion are welcome at the community's shared indoor pool, indoor and outdoor hot tubs, gym, steam room, games room and children's room. The villa also has its own private ski locker, fireplace, TV and Wi-Fi for cozy après-ski evenings, plus a furnished balcony for warmer nights.Luxe finishes like hardwood floors, marble and granite surfaces, and walnut cabinets distinguish the interiors of the 3 Bedroom Residence. High ceilings and oversized windows frame the mountain views, and the open-plan great room marries living and dining areas in a fully equipped kitchen-complete with breakfast bar-in one generous space.The 3 Bedroom Residence features a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed and fireplace. The second bedroom has two queen beds, and the third bedroom can be arranged with two queen beds or two twin beds as needed. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Start each morning of your holiday by making the 2-minute walk to Lionshead Village, the 3-minute walk to an express chairlift or gondola, or the 5-minute drive to Vail Ski Resort. If you're planning a trip during warmer weather, you'll find plenty to do year-round in Vail Valley, from the fairways of Vail Golf Club and flora of the Betty Ford Alpine Gardens to shopping and dining in Vail Village.Business License Number: 003670Copyright © Luxury Retreats. listing.listing_description: The exclusive Beverly Hills 90210 zip code is one that needs no introduction and it is there, among the homes Hollywood’s elite, that you’ll find L.A. Villa. The stylish four-bedroom house was built by a renowned French architect and overflows with all the amenities you could want for a relaxing stay surrounded by the finer things in life.The pool terrace feels like your own private oasis as lush green gardens scale the walls, majestic palms tower upwards and decorative curtains billow in the breeze. In the corner a Grecian fountain brings calm to your surroundings as you recline on cushioned deck furniture and enjoy the California sun. An al fresco dining area provides the perfect spot for a delicious meal under the stars. Technology flows subtly through the villa, with a central audio system reaching all main areas, fast Wi-Fi connectivity and a phone system offering free long-distance calls.Inside, hand-picked Italian furniture and African antiques adorn the spacious open-concept main room, and are lit up by sunlight pouring in through a retractable glass wall. There you’ll find two living areas, back-to-back: one facing a beautiful fireplace and the other orientated towards a large flatscreen television. The gourmet kitchen also adds to the home’s cutting edge feel, with high-end appliances and smooth, stone countertops that make cooking a pleasure. Meals can be enjoyed around the picturesque dining room table that seats six or a charming breakfast table.Each of L.A. Villa’s bedrooms feature an en-suite bathroom with premium fixtures, plus air conditioning, hair dryer, entertainment system and phone. The Master and second bedrooms house spa-quality bathrooms with designer bathtubs and walk-in showers. The fourth bedroom is located in a lovely guest house with its own living room. Housekeeping service is available five days a week.When you’re ready to explore, you’ll find the best of Beverly Hills all less than ten minutes away, including the upscaled shops and restaurants of Rodeo Drive. There’s also golf, tennis courts and grocery stores nearby. In less than half an hour you can get to many of the city’s top attractions like Hollywood and downtown L.A. Beach lovers can head West for 35 minutes to Santa Monica or up the coast to Malibu.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend days exploring the perfume capital of the world and nights mingling with the jet set along the French Riviera at Villa La Corniche. Named for the French word for cliff, this luxury vacation rental is perched above the city of Grasse, which has been producing fragrances for centuries. Book the property for a quiet getaway with friends and family, or as a private retreat from the film festival in downtown Cannes, just 15 minutes away.Take in sweeping views from the Southern Alps in the east to the Esterel Mountains in the west from the villa’s beautifully appointed terrace. More than an acre of gardens includes a heated pool, a sunny terrace with loungers and an al-fresco shower. Entertaining in the Riviera sunshine is a snap thanks to a pool house with a wine cellar, a barbecue, and outdoor dining tables for up to twenty-four guests. On cooler nights, step inside to gather around the satellite and Apple TVs; in the winter months, a gas fireplace will quickly dispel any chills.Recently renovated and thoughtfully designed, the open-concept interiors of Villa La Corniche are bright and modern. The inviting great room, encompassing sun-kissed sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen, welcomes guests with a mix of traditional and exotic pieces, from a tufted leather sofa to geometric poufs. Cozy up to the fireplace in the sitting area, or open the space to the terrace with several sets of French doors.The villa’s three bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and shared balconies, can host parties of up to six on holiday together. There are two with king beds, including a master suite that boasts a fireplace and gorgeous views, and one with a queen bed.Though Villa La Corniche feels tranquil and relaxed, it’s less than a mile from downtown Grasse, where visitors can tour historic perfumeries such as Galimard, Fragonard and Molinard. Visit during the month of August to experience the Fête du Jasmin, or Jasmine Festival, when crowds gather in the street to watch a parade, performances and fireworks. Or spend a laid-back day driving the coastal roads between Cannes, Antibes and Nice—all within day-trip distance—finishing with a honeymoon-style dinner at an oceanfront restaurant.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set on a hilltop in Chianti, villa Le Pratola offers views in every direction and something for every member of the family. Kids will love the pool and games room, while adults will appreciate the proximity to Siena and Florence. Five air-conditioned bedroom suites and nearly five acres of gardens mean there’s room for everyone to spread out.The villa is well-equipped for exploring or relaxing. Take a swim in the infinity pool, go head-to-head in the games room or at the pool table and work up a sweat in the compact gym. There’s a wood-burning outdoor barbecue, and a dining area in the stone courtyard where you can enjoy what you’ve grilled. Relax on loungers around the pool or take advantage of the Wi-Fi access indoors.Le Pratola’s stone walls and beamed ceilings are a traditional envelope for striking modern interiors. In the living room, a sleek sectional is pulled up to an original fireplace surround, and a red Lucite coffee table and striped chair add fun, glamorous touches. The dining room is open and airy, with a large arched window, and the state-of-the-art kitchen pairs stone countertops with glossy red cabinets.Each of the villa’s five air-conditioned bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom stocked with a hairdryer and toiletries. There are three bedrooms with queen beds, the master with a super king size bed and one of which also has a sofa bed. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds as well as a trundle bed. The villa has five bedrooms overall: Four bedrooms on the top floor, with an additional bedroom on the ground floor, located across the courtyard with a private entrance. For the smallest guests, baby equipment like a crib, highchair and booster seat is available.Though Le Pratola offers the peace and panoramas of a location in rural Chianti, it’s just over a mile from the Pozze di Lecchi restaurant, and about 2 miles from a grocery store, church and town center. You’ll find a train station and the Siena hospital 9 miles away, and it’s a 2-hour drive to the airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-in, ski-out access, luxury amenities and cozy interiors will have you falling for Skyfall Ridge 702. Part of the Edgemont community in Steamboat Springs, this refined Colorado vacation rental is just steps from both the Stampede ski run at Steamboat Ski Resort and exclusive community features. Book the two-bedroom villa for a quiet parents-and-kids ski break or a honeymoon in the mountains.Your holiday at Skyfall Ridge 702 includes access to the shared heated outdoor pool, hot tub and ski storage at Edgemont, as well as a complimentary seasonal shuttle. After a day on the slopes, bring the kids to the outdoor firepit for s’mores and hot chocolate, or unwind by the fireplace in the communal lounge. For private evenings in, the villa has its own balcony with a barbecue and mountain views and, inside, a wine cooler, fireplace and flat-screen television that will tempt you to curl up and relax.The villa’s interiors put a modern twist on traditional mountain lodge style. The open-plan great room boasts vaulted, beamed ceilings, plenty of windows with panoramic views and soft, neutral tones for a quietly stylish vibe. The sitting and dining areas share the double-sided fireplace, so you can listen to the flames crackle from the large sectional or the nailhead-trimmed dining chairs. A breakfast bar and office nook mean that other guests can keep the cook company in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.Even the bedrooms at Skyfall Ridge 702 have mountain views. The master suite is well appointed with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, fireplace and its own door to the balcony. If you’re traveling as a family or as a groupe of friends, the second bedroom is well equipped with a double size bunk bed, balcony access and a hall bathroom.One of the biggest perks of staying at Edgemont is the ski-in, ski-out access to the Stampede run via the ground floor of the complex. The community is also conveniently close to the shopping and dining in the mountain village. During the warmer months, use the villa as a base for rounds of golf at the nearby Rollingstone Ranch course or rafting, kayaking and fishing expeditions on the Yampa River. No matter what time of year you visit, you’ll always find naturally heated mineral waters and a laid-back ambience at the Old Town and Strawberry Park hot springs, just a short drive from the property.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find a home away from home in Steamboat Springs at Sunshine Peak Chalet. This newly built Colorado vacation rental close to the heart of the Steamboat mountain village welcomes groups of up to twelve with cozy, comfortable interiors and four bedrooms. Take advantage of the 3-minute drive to the nearest ski lift for a holiday on the slopes, or the spaces designed for entertaining by hosting a family reunion or getaway with friends.Stellar amenities at the villa will put you at ease. Your stay at Sunshine Peak Chalet includes complimentary ski shuttle service during the winter. The villa has a flat-screen television, video game console and sound system for après-ski lounging, as well as a gas fireplace. For laid-back evenings in warmer weather, head out to the private deck, which has a barbecue, hot tub and incredible mountain views. Practical touches like boot dryers mean you’ll never have to start the day with wet gear.You’ll want to spend most of your time in the villa’s open-plan great room, where large windows frame the mountains and a stone gas fireplace lends a warm, welcoming vibe. Take in the views from the leather sofa and snug wingback chairs, or gather around the dining table, which seats ten in rustic cane-seat chairs. The fully equipped kitchen will impress with a spacious island layout, custom cabinets, granite countertops and gourmet appliances.Sunshine Peak Chalet has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, perfect for couples, and two that share a bathroom, great for parents that want to keep an eye on kids. Larger groups can use the sofa bed in the media room or a roll-away twin bed for additional space. Soft tones like mauve and taupe and details such as sleek four-poster beds give the bedrooms a feel of quiet luxury.Once nicknamed Ski Town USA, Steamboat is known for its powder. And with Steamboat Ski Resort a 3-minute drive from the villa and the Thunderhead lift 5 minutes away by car, you won’t miss out on any of the action. But the region is also known for its eponymous hot springs, from the family-friendly Old Town Steamboat Springs to the honeymoon-worthy natural pools at Strawberry Park. There’s plenty to do in the summer, too, from hiking to golf at the nearby Rollingstone Ranch course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This elegant Spanish-Caribbean style villa is designed to capture the views and maximize outdoor living. The covered courtyard entrance with its Old World wooden doors, tiled floors and exotic plantings creates the perfect introduction to a stunning tropical view. Framed by royal palms and pink bougainvillea, the view is a panoramic vista filled with shades of blue from the sapphire sea to the deep blue sky; gorgeous in daytime; spectacular at sunset.Beautifully designed gardens surround the house and terraces. Epi wood decks on multi levels offer endless options for dining, lounging and sunning. You can be private or together with your friends or family. The upper deck flows off the main indoor living area. Under wide covered gazebos, you can lounge, dine or fire up the barbeque. Step down to the gorgeous lower level for a swim in the inviting pool surrounded by covered terraces and sundecks.The interior great room, with terracotta floors and dark Spanish style vaulted ceilings, is cool, breezy and light. Pocket doors open to the view. Comfortable oversized seating in white and taupe against dark woods set an elegant, low-key atmosphere for lounging and dining. Spanish inspired doors and windows are featured thought out the house for an exotic touch. The well-equipped new kitchen is sleek and contemporary.There are four bedrooms. Two are in private casitas off the upper deck. Spacious and comfortable, each room’s décor is a blend of serene whites and tans mixed with dark wood. Charming Spanish style shutters create privacy. Both casita bedrooms have sea and garden views as well as private patios. The gorgeous spa style bathrooms, with walk in showers, are designed in travertine accented with dark woods. Two additional bedrooms connect to the interior living space. It’s a wonderful set up for children. One room has bunk beds. The adjacent room has a king bed. The two share a spa style bathroom.Although secluded, you’re close to amenities. Long Bay Beach and Cupecoy Beach are only 2 minutes away. It’s also a short drive to Porto Cupecoy for grocery shopping, restaurants including island favorite Mario’s Bistro. Another 5 minutes from here and you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case or Philipsburg’s shopping haven while only a 10-minute drive to the international airport.Read our insider guide to Hacienda in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/06/vacation-diary-6-friends-enjoy-endless-caribbean-sunshine/)

listing.listing_description: Clinging to the rocks of the Amalfi Coast, this seventeenth-century cliffside home is situated for incredible Ocean views, with many unique vantage points throughout its spacious grounds. With five luxurious bedrooms and plenty of indoor/outdoor shared spaces, Pamina is a great place to throw a family reunion or special event, like a destination wedding. Imagine the pictures.Pamina’s exterior decor features lush greenery, ancient vines, fruit trees, and bare-stone, all of which convey the villa’s harmonious existence with its natural surroundings, a trend that continues throughout the interior. The terracotta flooring tiles, splashes of turquoise, wood furniture, and a natural-rock wall in one of the lounge areas all pay homage to Italy’s coast. Moving to the bedrooms, Pamina has two king-bed rooms, two queens, and two doubles. And, all of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Pamina comes stocked with basic grocery items, and a maid visits daily to take care of the house, as well as make breakfast for the guests, which you can enjoy at the breakfast table, formal dining area, or at the alfresco set on the terrace. After breakfast, relax inside with television, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. To beat the afternoon heat, hop in the refreshing swimming pool or find a shady spot on one the terrace living spaces and gaze upon the endless ocean view.Lined with gorgeous beaches, dynamic cliffs and mountains, and beautiful cities, Italy’s Amalfi Coast is great for day trips. Sorrento and Amalfi Town are both about fifteen kilometers from Pamina. Head a little further, and you can visit Naples, a legendary city for art and architectural history. If you feel like sticking close to home, Positano Beach and the town square are just a twenty-minute walk. There, you’ll find shops, restaurants, nightlife, and beautiful beachfront.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Modern style meets timeless mountain scenery at Hawks Hideaway. Designed by California’s Pinnacle Design Studio, this luxury home puts a fresh spin on the ski-lodge look. Not only does its location afford incredible views of the peaks around Breckenridge, it puts you and up to twenty friends or family members just minutes from skiing, sledding and more.There’s ample space at this Colorado vacation rental to entertain and relax. On warmer days, take in the views from the private deck, which has a barbecue, hot tub and firepit. In cooler weather, grown-ups will appreciate the sound system, wine fridge and fireplace, while kids will want to hang out in the lower-level media room.The open-plan great room at Hawks Hideaway places living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen in one space that’s big enough for everyone. Picture windows overlooking the mountains and a stone fireplace provide dual focal points, and a sectional and built-in window seat are the perfect spots to take them in. Unique wingback chairs elegantly mark the head and foot of the dining table, which seats twelve. The kitchen has gourmet appliances, wide stretches of countertop and a convenient breakfast bar.En-suite bathrooms in all six bedrooms ensure that everyone has a comfortable holiday. There are four bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own fireplace and balcony. The other two bedrooms, which each have two bunk beds, are ideal for kids.Though Hawks Hideaway is tucked into a quiet pine grove, you can use the villa as a honeymoon from real life or to take advantage of the best of Breckenridge. Ski areas, sledding and tubing, and even golf are all just a short drive away. Don’t miss charming downtown Breckenridge, which has one of the largest historic districts in the state.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let your body and spirit blossom at Villa La Semilla. This incredible Riviera Maya vacation rental, whose name translates to “the seed,” is designed to both nurture and pamper, with lush jungle surroundings, a private stretch of beach, and an attentive staff. Bring up to ten family and friends for a relaxing, rejuvenating holiday at this luxury property.Villa La Semilla is staffed by a cook who prepares three meals each day, a concierge who can help arrange activities, a housekeeper and a gardener. A palm-lined courtyard welcomes guests, and the villa opens to a tranquil oceanfront garden with an infinity pool, lounging and dining areas, and an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue and wood-fired oven. Two rooftop terraces, one of which has a pool, let you soak in the sun by day and watch for shooting stars at night.This one-of-a-kind home pairs contemporary architecture with rustic-chic interiors. Wood ceiling beams, slipcovered sofas and a weathered wood dining table give the open-plan great room a welcoming, farmhouse-inspired feel, while sliding glass doors and a stunning glass roof open the space to the outdoors. Though cook service is included in your stay, the villa also has a fully equipped kitchen.Each of the five bedrooms at Villa La Semilla has an en-suite bathroom and a private balcony with ocean views and a tempting hammock. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom to rival any honeymoon suite, and two bedrooms with two double beds each. Whitewashed floors and ceilings and macrame-style throws lend the bedrooms a breezy, relaxed feel, while pieces like tufted sofas, carved headboards and crystal chandeliers add touches of unexpected glamour.The villa’s location on quiet Soliman Bay gives guests postcard-worthy views and easy access to the beach. Take the provided kayaks out on the water, or pedal around the villa’s gated community on the bicycles. Be sure to visit the Tulum ruins, just a 15-minute drive away, book a tee time at the Riviera Maya Golf Course, and sample the famed nightlife in Playa del Carmen.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Ski-in and out of this contemporary condo on the slopes of Park City Mountain. Warm up the crackling fireplace while you take advantage of the living room’s elevated mountain view. Recharge your batteries in the private hot tub. Then, head out for a farm-to-table dinner and a little bar hopping, just a short walk from your front door in Canyons Village.Borrowing a few ideas from the traditional ski lodge, Apex Clubhouse delivers those warm vibes with dark woods, granite, and plush furnishings. Moving in its own direction, this trendy condo shows off sleek sightlines, contemporary fixtures, and a slightly industrial edge. The fully-equipped kitchen’s bar is the perfect place to gather for a drink before heading out. If you’re dining in, bring in a private chef or do a little barbecuing on the terrace. After dinner, throw the big game on the widescreen, or play one yourself in the games room.Ski-in/ski-out access makes it easy to hit the slopes whenever you please, saving lots on travel time to go exploring Utah instead. In the warmer months, golfing amongst the mountains offers a unique challenge. Sports like rock climbing, mountain biking, and rafting are exciting ways to interact with the rugged landscape. Fly fishing guides are great fun, too. If you’re looking for an indoor activity, do a little souvenir shopping at Park City Outlets.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy a Tuscan retreat that’s both quiet and secluded and convenient to the region’s cities at Villa Vianci. Originally built as a summer home where noble families could escape the heat, the restored seven-bedroom property offers an escape from the pressures of modern life without sacrificing modern conveniences. Located just off the highway between Florence and Siena outside the town of Staggia Senese, it’s in the center of Tuscany without being in the thick of things.The elegant three-story home is approached through a gated courtyard and surrounded by vineyards and cypress groves. There’s a pool with outdoor shower as well as a charcoal barbecue, outdoor dining area and plenty of lounge chairs for sunbathing. Thanks to the recent restoration, the interiors are air-conditioned and have Wi-Fi access. The property’s caretakers live on the premises, making it easy to get assistance if needed.The living areas of Villa Vianci prove that stately spaces can be comfortable, too. In the sitting rooms, terrazzo floors covered by Persian rugs, paneled walls and original moldings create an elegant envelope that’s filled by traditional-style wooden furniture and plush sofas pulled up to a fireplace. The formal dining room continues the theme with cool mint-green walls and antique sideboards. The kitchen, however, is fresh and modern, with white cabinets, black and white tile floors and marble countertops.Each of the villa’s six bedrooms has air conditioning but is just as elegantly decorated as the property’s common spaces. There are five bedrooms with king or queen beds, each of which has its own ensuite bathroom. The remaining two bedrooms share a bathroom; one has two twin beds, and the other has two twin beds that can be converted into a queen bed.Villa Vianci is set on a hilltop outside the ancient town of of Staggia Senese. From the villa, it’s just over a mile to the town’s church, restaurant, tennis court and grocery store. The Castellina Scalo train station is about 3 km away and the Colle Val d’Elsa golf course is 8 km away. There’s a beach 77 km away, and a ski area 137 away. The cities of Siena and Florence are 17 and 45 km away, respectively.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Note: The caretakers live on the premises of the villa, in a portion of the third floor with independent entrance.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Villa Agua Clara will experience noise, depending on what work is being done at the time. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Experience the ultimate in indoor-outdoor living within walking distance of the beach at Villa Agua Clara. Nestled into the jungle near Santa Teresa, this unparalleled Costa Rica vacation rental is designed to feel like an organic part of its surroundings. Its relaxed vibe and three bedrooms are perfect for a family holiday, a beach getaway with friends or a honeymoon away from it all.The villa is laid out around a courtyard with a private pool and al-fresco shower where you can while away sunny days or rinse off beach sand; both gas and charcoal barbecues are available upon request if you want to linger outdoors over dinner. Let birdsong be the soundtrack to your stay, or listen to a favorite playlist via the Bluetooth speaker or Wi-Fi.Sleek furnishings and plenty of natural textures give the open-sided living areas an air of casual chic, while features like LED lighting make the residence eco-friendly. Both the living and dining areas face the pool, as does the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Villa Agua Clara has two bedrooms with king beds, sofa beds and lounge areas, including the master suite, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, ceiling fans and air conditioning, and, like the main living areas, an easy mix of modern lines and organic materials.Perhaps the best part of this luxury property is its proximity to the beach; the clear blue waters of popular Playa Hermosa are just a 2-minute walk from the villa down a winding path. It’s also just a short drive from the nearest grocery store, the world-class surf break at Playa Santa Teresa and the up-and-coming beach town of Santa Teresa, whose laid-back restaurants are well worth a visit.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
