listing.listing_description: The Lookout is a stunning, mountain-view villa in South Palm Springs, situated in the neighborhood of The Mesa along the city's western edge. Designed by renowned local architect Thomas Jakway and completed in 2007, the 3,500-square-foot villa is a luminous celebration of the natural and cultural riches of this desert oasis. The beautiful landscaping harmonizes with the landscape, and even incorporates an antique structure into the alfresco entertainment area. Superb amenities include a saltwater swimming pool and hot tub, outdoor bar, alfresco dining area, and gourmet kitchen. Three king bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families and groups of friends up to six in size.Nestled amid palm trees at the foot of the mountains, the lower terrace forms an enchanting sanctuary for outdoor enjoyments. Sun loungers and a fire pit border the pool, while the shaded patio includes a superb cocktail bar. The ruins of an old house have been beautifully remodeled into an open-air retreat, with multiple sitting areas and a lovely fireplace.The main living and dining areas are on the upper level of the home, accessible from the pool terrace by staircase or elevator. An expansive terrace features alfresco dining for eight, a barbecue grill, and spectacular, panoramic views. A wide threshold fuses the terrace with the open-concept interior, featuring a comfortable TV lounge, a dining table for seven, and a chef-grade kitchen with breakfast bar. Ample windows frame the vistas like paintings, illuminating the home's modernist décor and beautiful wood accents.The master bedroom features a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and a stunning, freestanding tub carved of black stone. A wonderful two-sided fireplace is perched between the bedroom and bathroom. The two guestrooms are on the lower level of the home, each with a king bed and ensuite bathroom.The villa's prime location balances privacy with proximity to some of the city's finest attractions. Moortens Botanical Garden is a short walk away, and several golf courses are within minutes by car, including Indian Canyons Golf Resort, Mesquite, and Escena. Palm Springs Art Museum is just seven minutes away. Proximity to the airport ensures convenient access for wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.K0005 - The Lookout - Permit #4119 - TOT 3085

listing.listing_description: Dream Maker Villa is a fabulous private home in Scottsdale, Arizona, about seven miles from the city's downtown district, and a short drive from several renowned golf clubs. Ideal for an unforgettable getaway with family or friends, the villa is loaded with amenities for relaxation and play, including an outdoor hot tub and swimming pool, a putting green, numerous game courts, superb living and dining areas, an alfresco bar, and two kitchens (indoor and outdoor). With five ample bedrooms—including a kid-friendly bunk room—the villa comfortably accommodates families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to fourteen in size.The estate forms a private, resort-style oasis in the Arizona desert, surrounded by gorgeous mountain vistas. Enjoy games of volleyball, Frisbee golf, pickle ball, foosball, basketball, cornhole, and more, and practice your short game on the lush green. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs and plunge into the refreshing pool. Fire up the barbeque and mix cocktails at the bar, and gather for memorable meals in the fresh desert air. Sip wine around the fire pit at night, or crawl into the hot tub for a soak beneath the stars.The interiors are beautifully furnished in a modern style, appointed with superb media technologies, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and multiple fireplaces. The centerpiece is a spacious and luminous kitchen, fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, gleaming white-marble countertops, and a breakfast bar. The separate entertainment room includes a classy pool table, fireplace, and TV lounge. The villa also features an office and gym.The master bedroom includes a king bed and deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, rain shower, and freestanding tub. Three of the guest suites feature split-king beds that can be arranged as pairs of twins. Two of these rooms have ensuite bathrooms, while the third shares a bathroom with the bunkroom (which sleeps four children). There is also a twin-size bed and a trundle bed in the office. All of the rooms have air conditioning and TVs.Dream Maker Villa is just four minutes from Orange Tree Golf Club, five minutes from Camelback Golf Club, and ten minutes from Paradise Valley Country Club. The downtown districts of Scottsdale and Phoenix are both within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Banner Haus is a stunning mountain chalet at Deer Valley Si Resort in Utah, with ski-in/ski-out access to Banner Trail. Situated in the Empire Pass community—a high-end enclave about five minutes from downtown Park City—the villa features spectacular interior and alfresco living areas, as well as five deluxe bedrooms accommodating fourteen guests.The chalet's open-plan great room invites you to sumptuous evenings after an unforgettable day on the mountain. Ample windows invite exquisite alpine light into the home. Kindle a fire in the beautiful stone fireplace, and sip wine on comfortable sofas while screening a favorite show on the large screen. Prepare delicious meals in the fully equipped kitchen, serving appetizers and cocktails at the five-person bar, and gather in the beautiful dining room for a hearty feast. At night, cuddle up in the extraordinary media room. The villa also features a yoga room, and there is a charming and luminous breakfast nook by the kitchen—the ideal place to start your day. Outstanding AV equipment, heating, air conditioning, and an elevator ensure total comfort during your stay. At extra cost, chef and spa services are available, as well.Lovely alfresco living and dining spaces invite you to relish the fresh Rocky Mountain air. Soothe your body with an evening dip in the hot tub. Fire up the barbeque and sip cocktails on the balcony while beholding the mountain vistas. On clear winter nights, sip hot cocoa by the fire pit.The spacious and cozy bedroom suites provide the perfect settings for afternoon downtime and peaceful nights. There are four suites with king beds, and a kids' room with two bunk beds. All of the suites have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys mountain views, direct access to the balcony, a walk-in closet, and a jetted tub in its bathroom.Banner Haus balances exquisite privacy and seclusion with outstanding convenience. In addition to ski-in/ski-out access to Banner Trail, you're just ten minutes from the bases of Deer Valley Resort and Park City Resort. Park Silly Sunday Market, Historic Main Street, and Park City Golf Course are all within five to ten minutes of your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Stay in the shadow of Lone Mountain—and within steps of the ski slopes—at Swift Bear Lodge. This contemporary Big Sky vacation rental offers year-round access to the best of Montana’s outdoor adventures. Luxury amenities will help you relax after a day outside, and five bedrooms can comfortably accommodate a group of fifteen friends or extended family.Swift Bear Lodge features outdoor living areas with a barbecue and a private hot tub, for summer guests or visitors wanting a soak after a day of skiing. Inside, the villa has a wood-burning fireplace, pool table, TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi. Boot dryers, ski storage and laundry facilities mean your gear will always be ready for the next day’s activities.The lodge is laid out around an open-concept great room with a sitting area, dining table for ten and a fully equipped kitchen. The space is flooded with sunlight and mountain views thanks to oversized windows, and gets a cozy vibe from exposed wood beams. You’ll find a TV and the pool table in a separate games room on the lower level.The villa has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a jetted tub. One bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with a twin-over-double bunk bed share a bathroom. The fifth bedroom has two twin-over-double bunk beds, a queen sleeper sofa and an en-suite bathroom.If you’ve come out west for a ski holiday, the lodge’s Mountain Village location delivers. You’ll enjoy ski-in, ski-out access to the White Otter lift, and can reach the Big Sky Resort base in just 5 minutes by car. In warmer weather, play a round at Big Sky Golf Course or make the easy hike to the stunning Ousel Falls.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With accommodations for twenty-two and an incredible amount of luxurious indoor/outdoor spaces, Casa Koko is perfect for a large scale family vacation, golf trip with friends, or corporate retreat. All nine bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas are designed with space for the whole group in mind, and there are several well crafted little nooks to easily find privacy when desired. And, Koko’s views of the ocean, mountains, and golf course are unparalleled.Koko is located on the Punta Mita Peninsula at the same latitude as the Hawaiian islands, so you can expect near perfect weather all year. Taking that into consideration, architects designed Koko to merge seamlessly from inside to out, with numerous windows and openings to promote the flow of fresh ocean breeze, natural sunlight, and relaxed vacationers. Raw, exposed wood and stone are the structural components, while hay roofing and lush palm trees provide shade and protection. There are several lounge spaces inside, decorated with designer furniture, stained wood, and neutral, relaxing textures. The fully equipped kitchen comes with a chef, waiter, and bartender to take care of your group. And, there’s also a state of the art fitness room, media room, and spa.At meal times there are several options. Both inside and outside have a space suitable for eighteen guests, as well as a fourteen person breakfast lounge, and numerous smaller settings surrounding the main areas. On the terrace, guests will love the infinity pool and hot tub, sun loungers, sand terrace fire pit, hammocks, and amazing ocean view. There are also three housekeepers on site and shuttle service to help make your stay even more comfortable.Take a ten minute drive using the two, supplied, golf carts and you’ll find tennis courts, golf courses, and three beach clubs, all within the resort’s gated property. For some off-resort exploration, Puerto Vallarta is about an hour drive down the coast.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Watch as the sun sets behind nearby islands off the coast of Playa Danta at this breezy beach house in Costa Rica. Walk along the sandy trail, through light greenery and palm trees, to the beach. Work on your tan in a sun lounger on the terrace while the kids splash around in the pool. Later, drive 10-minutes into Potrero for dinner, and maybe a little souvenir shopping.Ocean-inspired turquoise and nautical pinstripes remind guests of the beauty beyond Casa Azul’s soothing walls. Natural wood and stone elements deliver a rustic-chic feel, while white-walls act like a canvas for an extensive collection of one-of-a-kind regional art. Start your mornings with a soak in the master ensuite’s French rub. Then, sip coffee on the sofa in the terrace lounge. After a few moments to yourself, join the group at the stylish picnic table in the kitchen for breakfast.Now that you’re ready for an exciting day, walk to Playa Danta, Las Catalina’s main beach. Conditions on Danta are clear and warm throughout the year, making a perfect setting for snorkeling, paddleboarding, and kayaking. When the tide is low, walk across the sand to Playa Danita for a more secluded beach experience. If there’s a golfer in the group, Vista Ridge Golf and Country Club is a challenging course that winds through lush jungle terrain. After, head to Playa del Coco for tropical cocktails at a beachfront bar.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find contemporary luxury just steps from one of the best surf breaks in Costa Rica at Villa Metisse. Set in a gated community between Playa Tamarindo and Playa Langosta, this beautiful modern vacation rental offers private beach access, plus a location close to a lively beach town and pristine national parks. Its bright, open interiors and four bedrooms can accommodate a group of friends or family for an unforgettable tropical holiday—or they can be reserved for a honeymoon away from it all.The villa is laid out around a courtyard with a swimming pool, a deck lined with sun loungers and a barbecue. Spend lazy days at the beach or enjoying the sun in your own backyard, then pour a glass from the wine cooler to sip as you browse via Wi-Fi in the evenings. There are laundry facilities, so you’ll start each new adventure with fresh gear, and a baby bed is available if you’re traveling with a little one.A wall of slide-away glass separates the deck from the villa’s open-concept great room. Stretch out on the chic yet inviting leather sectional, gather everyone around the dining table in fashionably mismatched chairs that seat ten or perch at the sleek breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Villa Metisse has two master bedrooms with king beds, one bedroom with a queen bed and one bedroom with two bunk beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans, and the king and queen bedrooms have views of the pool and garden.The property is within walking distance of Playa Tamarindo, known as both a surfing mecca and for the lively town filled with shops and eateries on its shores. It’s also within driving distance of several other beaches and beach towns, in case you’d like to do some exploring up and down the coast. Or make the short drive to Marino Las Baulas National Park and see the sandy stretch where thousands of leatherback sea turtles hatch every year.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Bask in the beauty of the Caribbean from this convenient mini-resort on the coast of Grand Cayman, just south of 7-Mile Beach. Watch the sunset over the ocean from the upstairs balcony. Spread a beach towel out on the lush lawns to work on your tan. Or relax inside amongst the air conditioning. Then, walk 2-minutes to Barefoot Cove, the resort’s private beachfront.Tuscan-inspired architecture mixed with the beautiful Caribbean environment is a recipe for a luxurious and relaxing atmosphere. The privacy of this stand-alone unit will make you feel right at home, but this home is right by the beach. Have family dinners in the formal dining area inside, decorated with designer furnishings and high-end electronics or keep it casual and eat at the picnic table outside by the barbeque.Private owners mostly populate the Casa Luna Community, so the beach and swimming cove never get too busy. You’ll also have shared access to their ocean-view swimming pool and hot tub, as well as the gym. The villa’s fully equipped kitchen has everything you’ll need to craft amazing meals. After dinner, curl up on the sofa with the kids, make a bowl of popcorn, and pick a movie on Apple TV.Take the included kayak out past the cove and do a little exploring along the coast where you’ll find Dart Family Park, a great spot for the kids to play in the day time. For dinner out, Grand Old House Restaraunt is just a 5-minute walk, or you could drive into Georgetown, the Island’s capital, for more options. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, the Greg Norman-designed course at the Ritz-Carlton is the best on the Island.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property is next to a halted construction project, please inquire with one of our Villa Specialists for details.This stunning waterfront villa is situated on Montego Bay along the northwest shore of Jamaica. Ideal for special occasions or serene escapes, the two-story home features breathtaking sea views and expansive outdoor living areas on both levels. Its resort-style pool terrace borders a lovely beach suitable for watersports and alfresco dining. Five comfortable bedrooms (four with king beds, one with a pair of twin beds) offer ideal accommodations for families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to ten in size. Your vacation rental includes the services of a talented private staff, including a butler and chef.Nestled amid lush gardens and palm trees, the villa evokes the ambiance of a secluded sanctuary bathed in Caribbean light. Step into the pool's refreshing waters as you gaze at the beautiful views. Sunbathe on semi-submerged loungers perched on the Baja shelf, relaxing to the sounds of the waterfall behind you. Take the villa's kayaks and paddleboards onto the turquoise bay, and return to delicious drinks from the bar. Dine alfresco on the beach or veranda, and linger outdoors deep into the night, sipping classic cocktails in the dreamy breeze.The interiors offer a cool, spacious retreat for relaxing afternoons and laid-back evenings. The open-concept space features a fully equipped gourmet kitchen, a dining table for ten, and a breakfast niche. There is also an office space for business travelers, as well as a comfortable media room with large TV.The exceptional master suite features a king bed, walk-in closet, deluxe ensuite bathroom, and expansive private balcony with covered lounge seating and panoramic sea views. There are three king guestrooms with walk-in closets and private, furnished verandas—two enjoy ensuite bathrooms, while the other has access to a hallway bathrooms and alfresco shower. The other guestroom has two twin beds, a walk-in closet, and an ensuite bathroom. All of the rooms include safes, air conditioning, and ceiling fans.Everything Nice is wonderfully located for guests of all ages, within easy reach of Aqua Sol Theme Park, Royal Decameron Montego Beach, Montego Bay Cruise Port, and Half Moon Resort and Golf Course. Complimentary transfer is provided to and from Sangster International Airport, just seven kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Bright blue skies and lush green fairways are the backdrop to an elegant Caribbean holiday at Sienna. Set on the tenth hole of the Robert Trent Jones-designed Royal Westmoreland golf course, just minutes from the beach, this Barbados vacation rental is perfect for avid players and devoted sun-seekers alike. Invite up to six friends or family members to join you at this three-bedroom luxury property.Tropical gardens surround the villa's outdoor living areas, which feature a private pool, barbecue, al-fresco dining for eight, and both shaded and sunny sitting areas. A wine fridge keeps refreshments at the perfect temperature, while Wi-Fi lets you easily share snaps of your stay. Guests are also welcome at the Royal Westmoreland resort clubhouse, gym, tennis court, beach and more.Travertine marble floors and coral-stone walls are the polished backdrop to the home's refined rooms. Panoramic windows flood the open-concept living and dining areas with sunlight, and even the fully equipped kitchen is bright and breezy. A separate den is a more intimate place to escape with a book or watch a favorite movie.Sienna has two bedrooms with their own balconies overlooking the golf course and the Caribbean Sea in the distance: a master suite with a king bed and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The third bedroom has a twin bed. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and, for your comfort, air conditioning.From the villa's golf-course setting, it's only a few minutes to the resort facilities on popular Mullins Beach, designer shops, polo and, of course, golf. A short drive will bring you to three other beaches, including picturesque Sandy Lane (the perfect setting for a honeymoon-style sunset stroll), and the shops and restaurants of downtown Bridgetown, the capital of Barbados.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Slow down to the pace of the clouds moving across the mountains—or seek adventure on their slopes at Lordens Penthouse. Nestled into a hillside just outside Queenstown, this South Island vacation rental affords panoramic views across Lake Wakatipu and a location close to ski slopes, golf and more. Let the scenery that inspired the Lord of the Rings films and countless other works of art inspire a holiday that’s as active or quiet as you like.The penthouse opens to a gorgeous glass-railed balcony with loungers facing the lake, a barbecue and al-fresco dining for eight. On cooler days, soak in the private outdoor hot tub, set back from the main balcony, or cozy up inside around the fireplace, satellite television, sound system and Wi-Fi.Inside, the villa is laid out around an open-concept great room that stretches the width of the balcony and has nearly wall-to-wall windows showcasing the views. In the sitting area, soft gray sofas get a pop of color from coral cushions, while in the dining area, a sleek white table seats eight. The adjacent kitchen is stylish and modern, with glossy white cabinets and a minimalist look, but is also fully equipped and has a convenient breakfast bar.Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has an en-suite bathroom and private balcony. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed.Lordens Penthouse is less than 24 km from the Coronet Peak and The Remarkables ski areas, Queenstown Golf Course and Wakatipu Yacht Club, giving you a choice of activities year-round. Bring the family to Skyline Queenstown for a scenic gondola ride followed by a thrilling luge, discover the shops and restaurants of downtown Queenstown or enjoy a night out at the casino.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to your own quiet piece of Bali at Abaca Villa Nyoman. This stylish vacation rental outside Seminyak was designed as a tranquil retreat, with a location amid verdant rice fields and a layout that encourages laid-back indoor-outdoor living. While its five bedrooms have space for ten guests, it can be rented along with the other Abaca villas to accommodate a family reunion or milestone celebration with friends.Your holiday at Villa Nyoman includes the services of a villa manager and housekeeper, as well as daily American or Asian breakfast. Bring a book or two to enjoy from the comfort of a lounger in the sun, cool off in the pool and finish the day with dinner from the barbecue. Inside, the villa’s amenities range from a cable TV, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth speaker to a wine fridge.This luxury property is designed to make the most of Bali’s warm weather, with open-sided living and dining areas. Natural textures like wicker, wood and stone only add to the feeling that the villa is part of the landscape. Although breakfast is included in your stay, there’s also a fully equipped kitchen that makes it easy to prep lunch and dinner.Villa Nyoman has three bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and open to a private terrace or the pool area.The Abaca villas are just a short drive from several beaches and temples. If you’re traveling with kids, take them for a day of fun at Waterbom Bali Waterslides; if not, book a round at the Nirwana Bali Golf Course by Greg Norman. For dinner, a spa treatment or a day of shopping, join honeymooners and families alike in Seminyak Square.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
